item.title: 13 Time Cut Easter Eggs, References & Hidden Details
item.description: While walking through a compelling time travel drama, Netflix's Time Cut instills nostalgia in viewers with its intriguing pop culture references.

item.title: Why Just Go With It's Reviews Are So Bad
item.description: The 2011 comedy movie Just Go With It starring Adam Sandler and Jennifer Aniston wasn't well received by critics for several reasons.
